DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine comparative effectiveness proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation balance exercise program rehabilitation ankle sprain injury .
DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitation Study Comparing Two Exercise Programs Ankle Sprains
DOC.criteria: Subjects symptomatic , nonrehabilitated , post acute ( 14 day ) lateral ankle sprain , Grade III Subjects lateral ankle sprain Grade III Subjects concurrent medial ankle sprain Subjects concurrent syndesmotic ankle sprain Subjects concurrent fracture Subjects chronic ankle instability Subjects history surgery ankles Subjects history lower limb nerve injury Subjects history musculoskeletal injury noninjured ankle , still symptomatic
